scriptures.title: The Art of the Void Pointer
scriptures.summary: Mastering the null reference requires a heart still as water. One must embrace the nothingness to find the object within.

scriptures.title: Refactoring the Nine Dragons
scriptures.summary: Reducing complexity in the legacy codebase of the Ancestors. How to tame the spaghetti code beast without severing the flow of Qi.

scriptures.title: Styles of the Hidden Sect
scriptures.summary: Cascading Style Sheets are like the shifting winds. Learn to control the specificity hierarchy to dominate the DOM.

scriptures.title: Asynchronous Meditation
scriptures.summary: Do not block the main thread. Let the Promise resolve in its own time, like a lotus blooming at dawn.
